resources.string:
Welcome to this app. It is part of my Ph.D Research meanwhile it might help me and others improve the testing of Android apps using reviews on Google Play.\n
It includes a set of reviews for Kiwix apps so you can practice ways to apply concepts and skills. Future editions of the app may have facilities to import additional reviews.\n
The app incorporates analytics on how it is being used. These are an integral part of the learning and research aspects of this project.
